basics.name: Gabe Lazo
basics.summary: Experienced devops and support engineer.  5+ years experience supporting business critical enterprise applications.  Led and managed team in troubleshooting and mitigating production issues as well as implementing permanent solutions. 2+ years experience in devops managing and implementing continuous integration workflows, cloud environment provisioning and deployment automation.  I have an excellent record of working cross functionally in advocating for the needs of the business and users.

work.summary: Lead devops team to drive configuration management, build, deployment and monitoring platforms.
highlights: Designed, implemented and maintained deployment automation from code check-in to production.
Implemented and automated process to create a 1% database that could be used for local development and in CI pipelines.
Led project to migrate all application deployment from uDeploy and shell scripting to Chef.

work.summary: Managed strategic and tactical day-to-day 24x7 operations of marketing and merchandising applications for macys.com.  Managed team in New York to provide rapid response and resolution.
highlights: Liaison between business stakeholders and engineering team.
Member of round table during holiday season that triaged issues across the entire enterprise.

work.summary: Led team responsible for 24x7 support of marketing and merchandising applications for macys.com.  Applications included product information management, photography workflow management, digital asset management and content management systems.
highlights: Successfully supported the migration of bloomingdales merchandising and marketing business onto multi tenant systems shared with macys.
Collaborated closely with business analyst and product management teams acting as technical subject matter expert for imaging workflow.
Designed and implemented monitoring tools for production environments that allowed for proactive response and reporting.

work.summary: Designed and implemented systems integration solutions for telecommunications platform.  Worked to upgrade customers to latest release builds.  Managed entire project lifecyle.

Designed and implemented systems integration solutions for a telecommunications client using J2EE.  Managed an offshore team and was accountable for all their deliverables.  Served as technical lead for client and worked to continuously establish best practices.

education.area: Computer Science and Engineering with Minor in Music
